Slide.Name: Welcome
Slide.Content: Welcome to the first Ransomware Quiz. This quiz contains information and questions about the basics of ransomware

Slide.Name: General Information
Slide.Content: Ransomware is a type of malware that, when installed on your computer, will encrypt all your data making it inaccessible to you. The hackers who made the ransomware will give you the password to get your data back, but only if you pay them a sum of money

Slide.Name: General Information
Slide.Content: Ransomware and other types of malware can be hidden in any type of file (not just executable programs) This includes PDFs, Excel and Word Documents, or even video files.
